data: {"generalSituation":"A band of clouds will cover the coast of southern China today. With the band of clouds thinning out, it will be brighter over the region in the next couple of days. The northeast monsoon affecting the coast of southern China will be replaced by a fresh to strong easterly airstream on Friday. A cold front is expected to move across the coast of Guangdong later on Saturday. Winds will strengthen from the north, there will be one or two rain patches and temperatures will fall appreciably over the region. Under the influence of the associated northeast monsoon, the weather will be dry over the coast of southern China early next week. It will be cool in the morning and at night. The temperature difference between day and night will be relatively large over inland areas.","weatherForecast":[{"forecastDate":"20251210","week":"Wednesday","forecastWind":"East to northeast force 4, occasionally force 5 at first.","forecastWeather":"Mainly cloudy. One or two light rain patches at first.
